Articles.Content:
Hello.

My game has a strange problem since 0.90. In 0g (and sometimes even in-atmo) when I try to grab a ladder on EVA, sometimes they send me into infinity and beyond with 40+ m/s of velocity.

I'm playing on 1.1.2 x64, stock.
do you clip parts into each other? clipping sometimes results in unexpected issues like that..

5 minutes ago, WooDzor said:

do you clip parts into each other? clipping sometimes results in unexpected issues like that..

 

No. It occurs only at pod-included ladders, never on Mobility Extenders

It used to happen every now and then with my old crafts. But I don't remember having happen lately.

Have you tried different angles of grabbing the pod? as in you're either aligned or 90 degrees rotated to the ladder?
